document_name: Resolution No. 181.462 - Modifies Resolution No. 181.401, which adopts the greenhouse gas emission factor for energy generation projects with renewable sources
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/COL/2004/COL-2004-11-10-Resolution No. 181.462 - Modifies Resolution No. 181.401, which adopts the greenhouse gas emission factor for energy generation projects with renewable sources_ca9a3c6913d289e68ca18d1d61668622.pdf
document_description: This Resolution modifies amends Resolution No. 181.401, which adopts the greenhouse gas emission factor for energy generation projects with renewable sources. It modifies the emission factor of 0.471 kg CO2 / kWh for the calculation of greenhouse gas emission reductions for energy generation projects with unconventional or renewable energy sources such as photovoltaic, hydroelectric, tidal, wind, geothermal and biomass, interconnected to the network, whose installed capacity is equal to or less than 15 MW, according to the methodology of the clean development mechanism.
